channel.title: Change text at mage spells?
channel.description: How do I change the text what it shows if you want to cast a spell?

item.title: Change text at mage spells?
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

jua:

Can’t find that in client.java :S[br][size=1]Posted on: January 16, 2007, 03:24:31 AM[/size][hr]You know it?

No bumping like that

Read full topic

item.title: Change text at mage spells?
item.dc:creator: @mariuswb mariuswb
item.description:
@mariuswb wrote:

search for sendQuest("@whi@Level 50 : Smoke Rush", 12941);
then change name and descriptions…

Read full topic

item.title: Change text at mage spells?
item.dc:creator: @jua jua
item.description:
@jua wrote:

Yes but where in my client.java do I need to put that.

Read full topic

@mariuswb wrote:

change what you want in this:

sendQuest("@whi@Level 75 : Fire Wave", 1554); sendQuest("@dre@A high level Fire missile", 1555); sendQuest("@whi@Level 79 : Entangle", 1594); sendQuest("@dre@Holds your target for 15 seconds", 1595); sendQuest("@whi@Level 80 : Stun", 1564); sendQuest("@dre@Reduces your target's att by 10%", 1565); sendQuest("@whi@Level 80 : Charge", 1636); sendQuest("@dre@Charges God spells", 1637); sendQuest("@whi@Level 82 : Teleother Falador", 12437);// Teleother Falador sendQuest("@dre@Teleports target to Falador", 12438); sendQuest("@whi@Level 85 : Tele Block", 12447); sendQuest("@dre@Stops your target from teleporting", 12448); sendQuest("@whi@Level 87 : Lvl-6 Enchant", 6005); sendQuest("@dre@For use on onyx jewellery", 6006); sendQuest("@whi@Level 90 : Teleother Camelot", 12457);// Teleother Camelot sendQuest("@dre@Teleports target to Camelot", 12458);

example:

Level 90 : Teleother Camelot
change that to
Level 90 : Teleother Camelotatota
then it says that in your serv

under it its

Teleports target to Camelot
change it to
Taileporats toraget toa camelota
and under

Level 90 : Teleother Camelotatota

it now says

Taileporats toraget toa camelota

(when you hold your mouse over Lvl 90 spell)
